description: Maximal size of a subset of any Abelian group of order n that does not contain 0 and fails to span the group nontrivially.
references: J. R. Griggs (griggs(AT)math.sc.edu), personal communication, Apr 24, 2001.
links: J. R. Griggs, Spanning subset sums for finite Abelian groups, Discrete Math., 229 (2001), 89-99.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 17 2001
extensions: n=21 is the first open case - it is either 7 or 8.
